subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Programmes developed to address ENVSEC priorities in Central Asia and management of UNDP involvement in ENVSEC partnership strengthened. The project serves as an 'umbrella' for all UNDP-managed projects under the Environment and Security Initiative.
